title: Textile, "A la gloire de Louis XVI", 1789
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave foundation. Component "b" is embellished with embroidery in satin stitch (woman's cap and fleur de lys) and stem stitch (netlike covering over globe).
inscribed: Several mottos in French as part of the design: "la liberte ou la mort" heldby a putti in a cartouche and and incomplete "sans la liberte de mo"..
dimensions: a: Warp: 81 cm (32 in.). Weft: 137.5 cm (54 1/4 in.) (Width is one selvedge to selvedge and one incomplete piece.) b: Warp: 67 cm (27 1/2 in.). Weft: 121 cm (47 1/2 in.) (width is one selvedge to selvedge and one incomplete piece.) Pattern: height of repeat not present. Textile designed so that when selvedge to selvedge widths sewn together design forms a straight repeat.
description: Design of four framed allegorical scenes, separated by swags, floral garlands and cornucopias. Red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "A la gloire de Louis XVI", 1789.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave foundation. Component "b" is embellished with embroidery in satin stitch (woman's cap and fleur de lys) and stem stitch (netlike covering over globe).. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-31-a,b.
